mapper.insert: insert into drop_item (id, keyname, itemname, `count`, zoneid, dateTime) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{keyname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{count,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{zoneid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update drop_item set keyname = #{keyname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, itemname = #{itemname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `count` = #{count,jdbcType=INTEGER}, zoneid = #{zoneid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dateTime = #{dateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, keyname, itemname, `count`, zoneid, dateTime from drop_item
select a.zoneid from drop_item a right join(select min(id) id from drop_item GROUP BY zoneid) b on b.id = a.id WHERE a.id is not null
